column4: Data Carpentry’s aim is to teach researchers basic concepts, skills, and tools for working with data so that they can get more done in less time, and with less pain

column2: Data science for ecologists and environmental scientists

column2: Tutorials and workshops on R and statistics
column4: This series of tutorials and workshops will gradually work through an extensive range of frequentist and Bayesian graphical and statistical theory and practice (focusing on R or JAGS interfaced from R)
column27: Includes tutorial on data simulation in R - bit unique relative to other courses. Map -making out of date
